en_text: The only thing that I am truly good at

en_text: demo torimaku kirei na loop wa

en_text: azayaka ni
jp_text: {\fad(600,600)\blur12\bord6\be8}鮮やかに

en_text: I tie my feelings into a rope

en_text: so let us approach the future with hope in our hearts

en_text: How was she? How was Mukaido?
jp_text: どうだった　向井戸
